list_definition.definition: (feminine hostess) a person who entertains someone else as his guest, usually in his own house

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The host and hostess greeted their guests at the door.

list_definition.mean_english: động vật hoặc thực vật mà vật ký sinh sống bám vào
list_definition.definition: an animal or plant on which another lives as a parasite.
a very large number of people or things
